DASHBOARD.DASHBOARD_DESCRIPTION: Welcome to TodoApp, your reliable companion for managing tasks. Start organizing your life scientifically and efficiently.
DASHBOARD.CREATE_TASK_DESC: Add new tasks to ensure you never miss anything important.
DASHBOARD.MARK_COMPLETE_DESC: Update the status of tasks as soon as they're done to keep track of your progress.
DASHBOARD.SET_DEADLINE: Set deadlines and reminders for tasks
DASHBOARD.SET_DEADLINE_DESC: Automate reminders to ensure you meet deadlines without stress.
DASHBOARD.PRIORITIZE_TASKS_DESC: Arrange tasks from most to least important to maximize productivity.
DASHBOARD.COLLABORATE_WITH_TEAM_DESC: Share tasks with colleagues and work together more effectively.
DASHBOARD.VISUALIZE_PROGRESS_DESC: Track your achievements with intuitive charts to make informed decisions.
DASHBOARD.START_ORGANIZING: Start organizing today to make your tomorrow more productive and successful!
